trends: There have been no other sightings in Lima
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was pulling out of my driveway on my way to work an overnight shift and noticed 2 red orange balls off in the distance a few miles away. They seamed to be not moving and just hovering there. I knew they where not plaines because they fly over my house all of the time and can see the flashing red and white lights where these where a solid red-orange color. I lost sight of them threw the trees as I drove down the road on my way to work.
Summary: Pulled out my driveway and say 2 oragne red balls in the distence
